CREATE TABLE Player (
  PlayerID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Name VARCHAR(255),
  UserName VARCHAR(255),
  CharacterID INT,  -- FK linking to Character table
  FOREIGN KEY (CharacterID) REFERENCES Character(CharacterID)
);

CREATE TABLE Character (
  CharacterID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Name VARCHAR(255),
  Level INT,
  XP INT,
  HP INT,
  Mana INT,
  Alignment VARCHAR(255),
  charClassID INT,   -- FK linking to Class table
  charRaceID INT,    -- FK linking to Race table
  FOREIGN KEY (charClassID) REFERENCES Class(ClassID),
  FOREIGN KEY (charRaceID) REFERENCES Race(RaceID)
);

CREATE TABLE Class (
  ClassID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ClassName VARCHAR(255),
  HitDie INT,
  PrimaryStat VARCHAR(255),
  Description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Race (
  RaceID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  RaceName VARCHAR(255),
  BonusStat VARCHAR(255),
  Description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Spell (
  SpellID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Name VARCHAR(255),
  Level INT,
  School VARCHAR(255),
  Effect TEXT,
  CastingTime VARCHAR(255),
  Duration VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE ClassSpell (
  ClassID INT,     -- FK linking to Class table
  SpellID INT,     -- FK linking to Spell table
  PRIMARY KEY (ClassID, SpellID),
  FOREIGN KEY (ClassID) REFERENCES Class(ClassID),
  FOREIGN KEY (SpellID) REFERENCES Spell(SpellID)
);

CREATE TABLE Monster (
  MonsterID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Name VARCHAR(255),
  RaceID INT,      -- FK linking to Race table
  ClassID INT,     -- FK linking to Class table
  CR FLOAT,        -- Challenge Rating
  HP INT,          -- Hit Points
  AC INT,          -- Armor Class
  Type VARCHAR(255),
  XP INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (RaceID) REFERENCES Race(RaceID),
  FOREIGN KEY (ClassID) REFERENCES Class(ClassID)
);

CREATE TABLE Boss (
  BossID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Name VARCHAR(255),
  MonsterID INT,     -- FK linking to Monster table
  PhaseCount INT,    -- Number of fight phases
  Lair VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY (MonsterID) REFERENCES Monster(MonsterID)
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment (
  EquipmentID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Name VARCHAR(255),
  Type VARCHAR(255),
  Bonus VARCHAR(255),
  Rarity VARCHAR(255),
  Description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CharacterEquipment (
  CharacterID INT,    -- FK linking to Character table
  EquipmentID INT,    -- FK linking to Equipment table
  PRIMARY KEY (CharacterID, EquipmentID),
  FOREIGN KEY (CharacterID) REFERENCES Character(CharacterID),
  FOREIGN KEY (EquipmentID) REFERENCES Equipment(EquipmentID)
);

CREATE TABLE NPC (
  NPCID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Name VARCHAR(255),
  Role VARCHAR(255),
  Faction VARCHAR(255),
  Location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Event (
  EventID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Name VARCHAR(255),
  Date DATE,
  Description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CharacterEvent (
  CharacterID INT,  -- FK linking to Character table
  EventID INT,      -- FK linking to Event table
  PRIMARY KEY (CharacterID, EventID),
  FOREIGN KEY (CharacterID) REFERENCES Character(CharacterID),
  FOREIGN KEY (EventID) REFERENCES Event(EventID)
);

CREATE TABLE Achievement (
  AchievementID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Name VARCHAR(255),
  Description TEXT,
  XPReward INT
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerAchievement (
  PlayerID INT,      -- FK linking to Player table
  AchievementID INT, -- FK linking to Achievement table
  PRIMARY KEY (PlayerID, AchievementID),
  FOREIGN KEY (PlayerID) REFERENCES Player(PlayerID),
  FOREIGN KEY (AchievementID) REFERENCES Achievement(AchievementID)
);
